long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instant Word Definition & Pronunciation
Unlock the power of words with our advanced Chrome extension! Instantly get definitions, phonetic spellings, and audio pronunciations for any word you highlight. Enhance your learning experience with features designed to make understanding and pronunciation easier than ever.

Key Features:

Instant Definitions: Highlight any word on the web to get its definition instantly. Powered by reliable dictionary APIs for accurate information.
Phonetic Spelling: See simplified phonetic representations of words, breaking them down into syllables with visual cues for easy learning.
Audio Pronunciations: Listen to both normal and slow pronunciations of any word. Hear it in a clear, professional audio format.
Interactive Pronunciation: Click to play audio and follow along with highlighted syllables to master pronunciation.
Synonyms & Examples: Discover synonyms and examples to deepen your understanding of each word.
Google Search Integration: Easily find more information with a “More” button linking directly to Google search results.
User-Friendly Design: Clean, intuitive interface designed for quick access and easy navigation.
Why Choose Us?

Our extension offers a seamless way to enhance your vocabulary and pronunciation skills directly from your browser. Whether you're a student, professional, or language enthusiast, our tool provides the resources you need to improve your understanding and use of English.

How to Use:

Highlight any word on a webpage.
Click the extension icon to view the definition, phonetic spelling, and audio pronunciation.
Interact with the features to listen to pronunciations and explore synonyms and examples.
Perfect for:

Students looking to expand their vocabulary
Professionals needing quick access to word meanings and pronunciation
Anyone interested in improving their language skills
Download now to transform the way you interact with text online!
